resources.string:
Welcome to WhatsApp Status Saver. This App is made to save whatsapp statuses such as images, videos and many more. We may access your data to provide better user experience but, you can deny to it. Thanks.

Also you can use our other Ad-Free apps such as Meta Music Player, Calculator, Weather and many more.

By Balayar.DEV
2\tFirst see your Recently Updated Statuses in Whatsapp. Watch complete Status.
3\tYou can save both Whatsapp and \t\t Whatsapp Business Statuses From Side Menu
4\tCome back to Status Saver App and Refresh. Enjoy:)
1\tTurn Display hidden Files On in your File Manager
5\tYou will Find Saved Statuses in your SavedStatus Folder in Storage
